decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (LPS-PL-000-PLA-dr-A-POO2, LPS-PL-000-PLA-dr-A-POO9, LPS-PL-000-PLA-dr-A-POO4, LPS-PL-000-PLA-dr-A-POO3, 5543_P008, Site Plan Received: 27 January 2016 5543/P/100 Rev. A Received: 18 March 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Prior to the first use of the MUGA hereby permitted, a Community Use Agreement relating to the multi-use games area, including, but not limited to: 
 	travel plan measures, 
 	draft contractual arrangements, 
 	availability of space for use, 
shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  The multi-use games area shall thereafter operate in accordance with that Agreement.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 8:00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The use hereby permitted shall not be open to customers outside the following times 07:00 - 18:00 Monday to Friday without written approval from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Creation of a multi-use games area with three-metre high fencing and erection of a single storey shed
